column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Invasion .
#Text=You sure you ca n't just lie down for a little nap ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I told you , I ca n't go back to sleep .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , staying up all night ca n't be good for you .
#Text=" Aang says : " Actually , staying up all night has given me some time to think .
#Text=And I 've realized some big things , Katara .
#Text=" Katara says : " What big things ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I see everything so clearly now .
#Text=What really matters .
#Text=Why I 'm really doing this .
#Text=I 'm doing it to save the world .
#Text=But more than that .
#Text=I 'm doing it for the people I love .
#Text=I 'm doing it for you , Katara .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , what are you saying ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm saying , I love you !
#Text=" Katara says : " What are we doing ?
#Text=" Aang says : " What our hearts have been telling us to do for a long , long time .
#Text=Baby , you 're my forever girl .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang !
#Text=I was just saying you should take a nap .
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh , I guess I kinda drifted off into a daydream .
#Text=" Katara says : " What was your dream about ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Uh , living underwater ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Sounds neat !
#Text="
